title: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six® Extraction United Bundle
description: Get the Deluxe Editions of 2 games in the ultimate Rainbow Six bundle: The award-winning Rainbow Six® Siege AND the NEW Rainbow® Six Extraction, where Team Rainbow faces a lethal, mutating alien parasite. Rainbow Six Extraction is a 1- to 3-player co-op FPS with: • Buddy Pass: Invite 2 friends to play FREE in co-op across any platform for 14 days • 69 guns, 25 gadgets, 18 operators with progression levels, 12 large dynamic maps, 13 mutating enemies, and free post-launch • 4 adjustable difficulty levels and a thrilling Endgame ranked mode Bundle also includes 4 crossover gearsets, Rainbow Six Siege Deluxe Edition with all 18 Rainbow Six Extraction operators unlocked, plus 3 EXCLUSIVE Epic gearsets and XP boosters in Rainbow Six Extraction
